text: ugē vadanaṭa savan dun suleyimān mada sinahavak pāmin, “magē deviyanē! oba mā kerehida, magē demavpiyan kerehida, labā dun obagē varaprasādayanṭa (obaṭa) mā kṛtagna vīmaṭa dayāva pahaḷa karanu mænava! oba sǣhīmaṭa pat viya hæki dæhæmi kāraṇāvanda maṭa kaḷa (hæki bhāgyaya mā haṭa labā dī) dayāva pahaḷa kara, obagē dayāva magin obagē hon̆da vahalūngen māvada ekatu kara harinu mænava!” yayi prārthanā kaḷēya
